message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $12,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000. This is my final offer.
